Extracted Data.Name: Simran Gupta
Extracted Data.Summary or Objective: Analytics Manager | MA Economics  MSE Manager Business Intelligence & Analytics driving sales strategy, inventory optimization, and campaign performance across high impact categories like Phones and TVs. Skilled in forecasting, segmentation, A/B testing, and data modeling, delivering data backed actionable insights. Adept at enabling demand driven planning, improving conversion funnels, and supporting strategic decisions across Sales, GTM, and Supply Chain in fast paced e commerce environments.

Experience.Title: Analytics Manager
Experience.Description: Led upsell campaigns during the festive season by segmenting 50K+ users using K Means clustering on behavioral and transaction data; drove  3 Cr+ incremental revenue Developed a dynamic stocking algorithm to identify real time sell in and sell through gaps, replacing static monthly planning and improving product availability in high demand zones by 12%+ Enabled 2Mn+ monthly sales by delivering business insights on product placement, OOS risk, competition benchmarking, and distributor profiling to guide sales and trade marketing decisions Optimized conversion rate on e commerce platform through A/B testing, boosting conversion rate by 40%, CTR by 15%, and session duration by 10% Built time series forecasting models to project quarterly sales and inventory with 94% accuracy, reducing inventory overhang and improving replenishment planning Created an inventory risk framework to flag and liquidate slow moving SKUs, helping reduce aging stock by 22% over 2 quarters through channel specific liquidation strategies

Experience.Title: Data Science Associate
Experience.Description: Marketing Mix Model: Optimized marketing impacting the bottom line of a prominent CPG client. Identified the key drivers of volume uplift, assessing the ROI for each marketing channel, and provided optimization and simulation strategies via Multivariate Regression Delved into the impact of price reductions, competitor s prices and promotional activities on sales

Experience.Title: Equity Research Analyst
Experience.Description: Involved in equity research and industrial analysis and making research projects of the assigned companies. Exposed to other broking and wealth products of Kotak Securities.

Experience.Title: Credit Processor Analyst
Experience.Description: Conducted a study to understand the financial data analysis of SME customers of Kotak Mahindra Bank. Worked with a team that assessed the credit worthiness and loan limit of an individual or company.

Education: M.A Economics, Madras School of Economics, 2020
B.A Economics, Miranda House, Delhi University, 2018
Class XII – ISC, Nirmala Convent School, 2015
Class X – ICSE, Nirmala Convent School, 2013

RESUME_TIPS: In your experience at Xiaomi, specifically mention managing **omnichannel inventory**, detailing how you handled inventory across e-commerce platforms and physical stores to reflect the job's focus on both retail and online channels. Quantify your impact by mentioning improvements in **inventory turnover ratio**.

Elaborate on your use of **forecasting techniques** beyond time series, highlighting if you used methods like **ABC classification** or **EOQ (Economic Order Quantity)** to optimize inventory levels and reduce costs. Add this information within your Analytics section to showcase a deeper understanding of inventory management.

Specify your experience with **replenishment rules** and **min max levels** in your previous roles, explaining how you dynamically adjusted these parameters to maintain optimal stock levels and prevent stockouts. Integrate these details into your work experience section under inventory management responsibilities.

Mention any experience with retail inventory planning tools or **ERP systems** such as **NetSuite**, **Zoho**, or **Unicommerce** that you may have used, even in academic projects or internships. If applicable, create a new 'Tools' subsection within your Skills section to list these and provide context.

In your role at Xiaomi, discuss how you collaborated with merchandising and sales teams to adjust forecasts for new launches and **promotions**. Quantify the impact of these adjustments by specifying improvements in forecast accuracy or reductions in **stock out %**.

Detail your experience with managing inventory in a **FOFO franchise** model, if any, showcasing how you handled the unique challenges of such a setup. If not, research the model and articulate how your skills would apply, adding this insight in your cover letter or during an interview.

Expand on your bullet point related to ‘Optimized conversion rate on e-commerce platform,’ describing how you used data analysis to allocate stock for new launches and reorders. Highlight any specific allocation strategies that led to improved **store fill rate** or reduced **overstock** situations.

While discussing your use of SQL and Power BI, mention how you automated **reporting** and built **dashboards** to track inventory health and provide insights for leadership and planning reviews. Quantify the benefits, such as time saved or improved decision-making speed.

When describing your work at Gain Insights Solutions, specify how you identified and proposed actions for **slow moving** and **aging stock** items across all channels, linking this back to improving **inventory turnover ratio** and reducing capital tied up in inventory.

Provide an example of a time when you monitored **stock movement** and initiated timely transfers from the central warehouse to prevent stockouts or overstock situations. Use quantifiable data, such as a percentage increase in sales due to improved availability, to emphasize your impact.

omnichannel inventory.DESCRIPTION: Learn how to integrate online and offline channels for a seamless customer experience and efficient inventory management.
Master the strategies to unify all your sales channels and deliver exceptional customer experiences across every touchpoint.
A free video explaining the core concepts of omnichannel retail and its benefits.

ABC classification.DESCRIPTION: Learn about ABC classification, inventory control techniques, and demand forecasting methods.
Understand ABC analysis and other inventory management techniques to optimize stock levels and reduce costs.
A free tutorial on how to perform ABC analysis to prioritize inventory items.

EOQ.DESCRIPTION: Learn how to use EOQ models and other analytical techniques to optimize inventory and supply chain operations.
Learn how to calculate and apply EOQ for efficient inventory control and cost reduction.
A free video explaining how to calculate EOQ and its applications.

NetSuite.DESCRIPTION: Gain expertise in NetSuite ERP functionalities, including inventory management and supply chain operations.
Learn the basics of NetSuite ERP, including navigating the interface and managing inventory.
A playlist of free tutorials on NetSuite, covering various modules including inventory management.

Zoho.DESCRIPTION: Official training program on Zoho Inventory, covering setup, configuration, and usage for inventory management.
Learn how to efficiently manage your inventory using Zoho Inventory, covering features like stock tracking and reporting.
A free video tutorial demonstrating the key features and functions of Zoho Inventory.

Unicommerce.DESCRIPTION: Official training modules on how to use Unicommerce for multi-channel order and inventory management.
Practical guide to manage inventory and orders across multiple e-commerce platforms using Unicommerce.
A free video tutorial explaining the basic functionalities of Unicommerce.

FOFO franchise.DESCRIPTION: Learn the fundamentals of franchise operations, including financial management and inventory control.

FOFO franchise.COURSE_NAME: How to Start and Run a Successful Franchise
FOFO franchise.DESCRIPTION: A comprehensive course on setting up and managing a franchise business, with a focus on inventory management.
A free video series covering the basics of franchising.

replenishment rules.DESCRIPTION: This course provides a hands-on approach to creating effective replenishment strategies, including setting up replenishment rules.
A comprehensive course focusing on techniques and tools to ensure smooth inventory replenishment and avoid stockouts.
A free YouTube tutorial that covers basic inventory replenishment rules and methods.

min max levels.DESCRIPTION: Learn how to determine optimal min/max inventory levels using various analytical techniques.
This course is tailored for retail businesses to manage inventory effectively, including the setting of min and max levels for optimal stock.
A free tutorial demonstrating how to set min/max inventory levels using Excel.
